mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (isbn, cate_num, title, pub_name, pub_date, sale_stat, sale_vol, papr_pric, e_pric, papr_point,e_point, tot_page_num, tot_book_num, sale_com, cont, rating, info, intro_award, rec, pub_review, pre_start_page, pre_end_page, ebook_url, book_reg_date, regi_id, reg_date, reg_id,up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{cate_num}, #{title}, #{pub_name}, #{pub_date}, #{sale_stat}, #{sale_vol}, #{papr_pric}, #{e_pric}, #{papr_point}, #{e_point}, #{tot_page_num}, #{tot_book_num}, #{sale_com}, #{cont}, #{rating}, #{info}, #{intro_award}, #{rec}, #{pub_review}, #{pre_start_page}, #{pre_end_page},#{ebook_url}, #{book_reg_date}, #{regi_id}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), 'admin', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), 'admin')

INSERT INTO book_image (isbn, img_seq, img_url, img_regi_day, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{img_seq}, #{img_url}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), "reg_id",DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), "up_id")

choose.when: INSERT INTO writing_contributor ( cb_num, name, job1, job2, cont_desc, wr_chk, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id ) VALUES ( #{cb_num}, #{name}, "job1", "job2", "wr_desc", 'Y', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), "reg_id", DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), "up_id" );

INSERT INTO writing_contributor ( cb_num, name, job1, job2, cont_desc, wr_chk, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id ) VALUES ( #{cb_num}, #{name}, "job1", "job2", "trl_desc", 'N', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), "reg_id", DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), "up_id" );

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_contributor (isbn, cb_num, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{cb_num}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), "reg_id", DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), "up_id")
mapper.select: SELECT img_seq FROM book_image where isbn = #{isbn} ORDER BY img_seq DESC Limit 0,1;

SELECT bi.img_url AS repre_img, b.*, c.name AS whol_layr_name, COALESCE(bdh.papr_disc, 0) AS papr_disc, COALESCE(bdh.e_disc, 0) AS e_disc, ( SELECT wc.name FROM writing_contributor wc JOIN book_contributor bc ON wc.cb_num = bc.cb_num WHERE bc.isbn = b.isbn AND wc.wr_chk = 'Y' LIMIT 1 ) AS wr_name, ( SELECT wc.name FROM writing_contributor wc JOIN book_contributor bc ON wc.cb_num = bc.cb_num WHERE bc.isbn = b.isbn AND wc.wr_chk = 'N' LIMIT 1 ) AS trl_name FROM book b LEFT JOIN book_image bi ON b.isbn = bi.isbn AND bi.main_img_chk = 'Y' LEFT JOIN book_disc_hist bdh ON b.isbn = bdh.isbn AND NOW() BETWEEN bdh.disc_start_date AND bdh.disc_end_date LEFT JOIN category c ON b.cate_num = c.cate_num WHERE b.isbn = #{isbn}
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET isbn = #{isbn}, cate_num = #{cate_num}, title = #{title}, pub_name = #{pub_name}, pub_date = #{pub_date}, sale_stat = #{sale_stat}, sale_vol = #{sale_vol}, papr_pric = #{papr_pric}, e_pric = #{e_pric}, papr_point = #{papr_point},e_point = #{e_point}, tot_page_num = #{tot_page_num}, tot_book_num = #{tot_book_num}, sale_com = #{sale_com}, cont = #{cont}, rating = #{rating}, info = #{info}, intro_award = #{intro_award}, rec = #{rec}, pub_review = #{pub_review}, pre_start_page = #{pre_start_page}, pre_end_page = #{pre_end_page}, ebook_url = #{ebook_url}, up_date = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), up_id = #{up_id} WHERE isbn = #{isbn}
